title: Did Remco Evenepoel Walk Away from Cycling’s First $10 Million Contract?
content:
Evenepoel chooses loyalty over Red Bull-Bora’s blockbuster contract temptation that would have been cycling's first eight-figure-deal.

Read the full article at Did Remco Evenepoel Walk Away from Cycling’s First $10 Million Contract? on Velo.
author: ahood
